entry.title: Fwd: [BIP 15] Aliases
entry.summary: In a conversation between Luke-Jr and Joel, Luke-Jr stated that sending something to david.bitcoin.se was not a valid URI. Joel responded by saying that it does not have to be a valid URI as long as the recipient or software can make it into one. Joel noted that his web-browser could open the URL without issue and for bitcoin clients, the guess would be https://.
